addIngredient

public void addIngredient(java.lang.String code,
                          java.lang.String name,
                          float quantity,
                          java.lang.String unit)
                   throws HackingCookException
Add ingredient to ingredient's list of HackingCook.

Parameters:
code - ingredient's code.
name - ingredient's name.
quantity - ingredient's quantity.
unit - ingredient's unit of measure.
Throws:
HackingCookException - in case of null parameters or quantity == 0.
HackingCookException - in case of list contains the ingredient.
